events_gradient.duration: Duration from start to end of event (unit: seconds)
events_gradient.integral: List of 3 integrals from start to end of axis waveforms (unit: tesla*seconds)

events_receive.duration: Duration from first to last acquisition

events_rf.duration: Duration from start to end of event (unit: seconds)
events_rf.integral: Integral from start to end of waveform (unit: tesla*seconds)

hardware.sample_period: Spacing between each sample of waveforms (unit: seconds)
